import React, { useState, Fragment } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { FaInstagram } from "react-icons/fa"; import * as FaIcons from "react-icons/fa"; import * as AiIcons from "react-icons/ai"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { signout } from "../Actions/signAction"; export default function Navigation() { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const [sidebar, setSidebar] = useState(true); const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart); const { cartItems } = cart; const userSignIn = useSelector((state) => state.userSignin); const { userInfo } = userSignIn; const dispatch = useDispatch(); const signoutHandeler = () => { dispatch(signout()); }; const showSidebar = () => setSidebar(!sidebar); return (
Home
About
setShow(!show)} >
setShow(!show)}> Photography {" "}
{show && (

Visions
Souls in a Box
)}

)}

*/}

{userInfo ? (
{userInfo.name} {" "}

) : (

)} {userInfo && userInfo.isAdmin && (

  • Orders
  • Users
  • Photo Upload
)}
); }
